ygData.authorName: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4
ygData.from: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: They probably look at you funny since you are an enchanter asking a bard to keep two targets mezzed.  That would be your responsibility since you are better at
ygData.messageBody:
They probably look at you funny since you are an enchanter asking a bard to
keep two targets mezzed. That would be your responsibility since you are
better at it. If I group with an enchanter and they ask me to mez targets,
then I'm gonna assume they are the one clueless about their class, not me.
I will however likely have songs memmed to bail them out in the event they
get in trouble.

Now if there is no enchanter in the group and the bard can't perform basic
crowd control because he doesn't know how, then you have a case.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Amy Pratt [mailto:pratts001@...]
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2001 10:25 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Soloing bards

Ask them to keep 2 targets mezzed and they look at you funny. In short, the
bards I'm grouping with seem so clueless about their class that they're
actually detrimental to the group.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
